scripts.build: rm -rf build/ && mkdir build &&  parcel build ./src/xrlToXfdf/xrlToXfdf.js -d ./build --out-file xrlToXfdf.min.js --no-source-maps && rm -rf ./build/lib && cp -a ./public/lib/. ./build/lib && cp -a files/. build/
scripts.build-debug: rm -rf build/ && mkdir build &&  parcel build ./src/xrlToXfdf/xrlToXfdf.js -d ./build --out-file xrlToXfdf.min.js --no-source-maps --no-minify && rm -rf ./build/lib && cp -a ./public/lib/. ./build/lib && cp -a files/. build/
